com.droidcare.control

Class AlarmReceiver

  • Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • AlarmReceiver

  • public class AlarmReceiver
extends BroadcastReceiver
    Author:
    Edwin Candinegara Receives "ALARM" broadcasts for notification purpose (the type of notification depends on the user's choice).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AlarmReceiver.OnFinishListener

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlarmReceiver

        public AlarmReceiver()

    • Method Detail

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(Context context,
             Intent intent)
        This method definition is overriding the onReceive method in BroadcastReceiver. The method defines what to do when an "ALARM" is on. It notifies the user through local notification, SMS, or email depending on what the user chooses.

      • showLocalNotification

        private void showLocalNotification(Context context,
                         Appointment appointment,
                         String content)
        This method is responsible for showing local notification in the user's Android phone.
        Parameters:
        context - this refers to the context of the method caller (BroadcastReceiver's context)
        appointment - an Appointment object whose information will be used in the local notification content.

      • sendSMSNotification

        private void sendSMSNotification(Context context,
                       Appointment appointment,
                       String content)
        Simulates a SMS notification. This method only SIMULATES an incoming SMS. It does not use any GSM provider to actually send a SMS notification.
        Parameters:
        context - the context from which the intent will be called
        appointment - a due Appointment object

      • sendEmailNotification

        private void sendEmailNotification(Appointment appointment,
                         AlarmReceiver.OnFinishListener onFinishListener)
        This method is responsible for sending a Email notification to the user's registered email.
        Parameters:
        appointment - an Appointment object whose information will be used in the Email notification content.
